file_content.text: General, the chemical plant is ours. The Sith never finished their bomb.
After all our time together, I never expected anything less.
Your Jedi army sent the Empire packing. Every weapon factory in the sector is now ours, and we're turning those munitions against the enemy.
Even better, there were no casualties among your people. It's a rock-solid victory.
I'm glad my people are safe. I know this must have been hard on them.
That's wonderful news.
They looked pretty green when they first arrived, but they're gaining confidence.
I wish your Jedi army was so successful. They took back Thrakus's corporate headquarters, but the enemy looted all her weapon factories.
The Empire is now better armed, plus you lost a full Jedi squad on this mission.
The man directing our enemy is still at large.
I need to find Master Braga.
My people will root out Master Braga's hiding place. We just need more time.
I expected we'd lose people, but not so quickly. What happened?
How did they die?
From what I hear, that headquarters was a maze. Your Jedi split up and wandered into an ambush.
Our goal was to kick the Empire out of Labor Valley completely. Can you do it or not, General?
Do we control this sector?
With the head start your Jedi gave us? Absolutely. Don't expect overnight results, though.
Considering the firepower the Empire escaped those factories with... I don't know.
Republic forces have just engaged the Empire in the Axial Park sector. The fighting is heavy, and SIS reports plenty of Sith activity.
Maybe we'll find your missing Jedi there. Worth a shot.
Well, we know Master Braga isn't here.
Tol Braga surely has a hand in that battle. We should go.
Large battles require strong leaders. There's a good chance your target's there.
I already have people in Axial Park at these coordinates. I'll alert the other Jedi to meet you there. Var Suthra out....
Congratulations. You saved all my weapon factories, at the expense of my company's assets.
The Empire stole all our precious resources. My company lost billions to those scum. Farewell, Jedi.
Your forces performed splendidly. They drove the Empire from my headquarters before it could loot any precious resources.
I trust you'll find my gratitude as generous as promised. Farewell.
Master Braga = hiding in Axial Park? // Jedi + T7 = find him
